comments.body: This is repackaging, right? If so can you write a few lines to what you chose that route instead of building from source?

I believe this is the standard way provided by D lang to install their compilers. I have no experience with the language neither its compilation. I am pulling this recipe to solve a dependency to another tool I am currently uploading to the bioconda channel.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +7,11 @@chmod a+x ddemangle dman dmd dumpobj dustmite obj2asm rdmd

cp ddemangle dman dmd dumpobj dustmite obj2asm rdmd $PREFIX/bin

export DFLAGS="-I$SRC_DIR/src/phobos -I$SRC_DIR/src/druntime/import -L-L$SRC_DIR/linux/lib64 -L--export-dynamic"
